pageContext.claim: “I was with -- talking to Governor Murphy, and they have thousands of lives -- I won't even say how many; just thousands of lives, hard to believe -- in New Jersey. And he said there was only one life that was 18 or younger. One person died and that was a person -- a young man that had some medical difficulty.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump apparently heard this from New Jersey Gov. Murphy when they had dinner on June 12. At that point, one child -- a 4 year old -- had died of covid-19 in New Jersey. But Trump's statistic is out of date as of June 15, when the state announced that the second child had died.
